sogou-zhongkao.adv: 甚至; 即使[出现501次)];甚至更; 还(比较时表示强调)[出现90次)]

1.en: At this point, labor could be one or two days, or even weeks, away, with your cervix continuing to open gradually over that time.
1.cn: 在这个时候，临产可能会在一到两天后，甚至几个星期以后，一直到你的宫颈继续逐渐扩张完全。

2.en: A man, as well as a woman, when excited, will definitely find a glass or even a fork to stroke it or to touch it with his fingers.
2.cn: 一位男士，同样地或者是一位女士，在兴奋地时候，就一定会找来一个玻璃杯或者甚至一把叉子来敲击或者用他的手指触摸。

3.en: Some of you could actually get a chance for a do-over, and you might even get it right this time.
3.cn: 你们中的一些实际上可以得到一个机会重新开始，甚至在这个时候你可以得到这场爱情。

1.en: We don't even have a place to live. This sucks.
1.cn: 我们甚至无家可归，一切都糟透了。

2.en: Nothing. We're not doing anything. We're not even out.
2.cn: 我们没干什么，我们甚至没出去。

3.en: And in their use of color, flowers went even further.
3.cn: 花对颜色的利用甚至达到了更高的境界。

4.en: Define "I might even like you more than 'like you."
4.cn: 解释一下“甚至可能比喜欢你还要喜欢你”。

5.en: Like my dough, this could even be done overnight.
5.cn: 就像我的面团一样，甚至可能花费一晚上来做。

6.en: He's so diversified, he doesn't even know what he owns.
6.cn: 他的产业太多元化了，他甚至不清楚自己拥有什么。

7.en: Marijuana, Cocaine, MDA, Heroin, Assault weapons and even murder.
7.cn: 大麻，可卡因，MDA，海洛因，攻击性武器，甚至可以雇凶杀人。

8.en: My people never even left the house. I'm not even cream cheese. I'm American cheese. I'm individually wrapped. Here I come.
8.cn: 我的家人甚至都没出过这个国家。我甚至不是奶油干酪女神。我就是美国奶酪，还是独立包装的。接好了。

9.en: I didn't even have a chance to act as though I'm okay with it.
9.cn: 我甚至没办法假装，我不会在意。

10.en: You can even join a cruise to see the lava pour into the ocean.
10.cn: 您甚至可以乘搭游船观看熔岩涌入大海。

11.en: She even cares about me. And I've done very little to earn that.
11.cn: 她甚至很关心我，虽然我几乎啥也没做。

12.en: I can't believe it. Yeah. They even do you. They do me?
12.cn: 我简直无法相信。他们甚至还模仿你。模仿我？

13.en: All with the knowledge that no one would ever even know her name.
13.cn: 她明知，甚至没有一个人会知道她的名字。

14.en: I don't want to ruin anything. I don't even want to meet the prince.
14.cn: 我不是想捣乱，我甚至不指望能见到王子。

15.en: It was an even higher level, it influenced others I didn't even know in ways I could never imagine.
15.cn: 这是更高一层的，它甚至影响了我不认识的人，这是我从来没有想过的。

16.en: I can't seem to get her attention. Or even say the right thing.
16.cn: 我似乎无法引起她的注意，甚至都没法把话说对。

17.en: Midge is even breaking up with Moose. No. About time, right?
17.cn: 米吉甚至和慕思分手了。不会吧。早该改了，对吧？

18.en: They could lie to us. Maybe even hurt us or the guests.
18.cn: 他们可以对我们撒谎了，甚至可能会伤害我们或是游客。

19.en: I want to be challenged, and I guess I might even want to be needed.
19.cn: 我想要迎接挑战，甚至我想得到被需要的感觉。
